name: EiNSTASOFT

overview:
The world as we know it today is essentially and significantly driven by technology and each individual around us invariably uses technology for survival and to make his life easier by some level.

Yet, we are still struggling to solve and tackle several critical problems in nature affecting the general public. Our group is dedicated to make this world a better place for humans by providing innovative solutions for day-to-day activities and play a pivotal role in influencing their way of life.

Sounds clichÃ©d? Well, the facts have been laid and we truly believe in what we have set out to achieve. This group is initiated to Inspire. We strive to enlighten people about the power and reach of technology and how they can use technology to propel their careers, gain information, ease the pressures of their fast-paced stressful lives and their challenges at work through our novel i.D.e.a.s !!
